CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(SLA_trigger__c, "Red"), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error24.png", "Red", 16, 16), IF( ISPICKVAL(SLA_trigger__c, "Yellow"), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning24.png", "Yellow", 16, 16), IF( ISPICKVAL(SLA_trigger__c, "Green"), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm24.png", "Green", 16, 16), IMAGE("/img/s.gif", "NA", 16, 16) ) ) )
CustomField.label: SLA Status
